document_title: Warts on hands (fingers): Causes, signs, treatment and prevention
subsection_name: mun-coc-o-tay.json_5_Who is at risk for hand warts?
subsection_content:
Each person's immune system is different, not everyone is infected with the HPV virus and develops warts. But the following subjects are at high risk of getting warts on their hands:
1. Children
Warts on the hands are common in children because this age group is often hyperactive, making the skin vulnerable. In addition, children are not aware of personal hygiene, so the rate of warts on their hands is very high.
2. Teenagers
After children, adolescents have a high rate of acne on the hands because their immune system is not yet mature enough to fight HPV.
